commandDescription.en-US: Tells you what is playable in the shop or when it is playable
commandDescription.fr: Te dit ce qui est jouable dans la boutique ou quand c'est jouable
commandDescription.pt-BR: Te diz o que está jogável na loja quando estiver jogável

help.en-US:
Type `/$<commandName>` to know what is playable in the shop
Type `/$<commandName> $<missionOptionDescription>` to know when `$<missionOptionDescription>` is playable in the shop
help.fr:
Tape `/$<commandName>` pour savoir ce qui est jouable dans la boutique
Tape `/$<commandName> $<missionOptionDescription>` pour savoir quand `$<missionOptionDescription>` est jouable dans la boutique
help.pt-BR:
Digite `/$<commandName>` pra saber o que está jogável na loja
Digite `/$<commandName> $<missionOptionDescription>` pra saber quando `$<missionOptionDescription>` estará jogável na loja

reply.en-US:
**$<challengeName>** in **$<levelName>** will be playable for 1 day starting:
$<scheduleList>
reply.fr:
**$<challengeName>** dans **$<levelName>** sera jouable durant 1 jour à partir de :
$<scheduleList>
reply.pt-BR:
**$<challengeName>** no(a) **$<levelName>** será jogável por 1 dia, começando em:
$<scheduleList>
